而して: (しかして) - and; and then; thus; and now
而るを: (しかるを) - even so; though that may be
而今而後: (じこんじご) - in the future; from now on; henceforth; hereafter
而後: (しかるのち) - thereafter; after doing that; followed by
耐えうる: (たえうる) - to withstand; to be able to endure
耐える: (taeru) - suportar, aguentar, tolerar; sustentar, resistir, enfrentar; ser adequado para, estar à altura de
耐え得る: (たえうる) - to withstand; to be able to endure
耐え忍ぶ: (たえしのぶ) - to put up with; to endure; to bear patiently
耐え抜く: (たえぬく) - to stick it out (until the end)
耐アルカリ性: (たいアルカリせい) - alkali resistance
耐タンパー性: (たいタンパーせい) - tamper resistant
耐久商品: (たいきゅうしょうひん) - durable (consumer) goods
耐久消費財: (たいきゅうしょうひざい) - durable (consumer) goods
耐久財: (たいきゅうざい) - durable goods; durables
耐乏生活: (たいぼうせいかつ) - (yoji) hard life; life of austerity
耐候性: (たいこうせい) - weather resistance (e.g. in building material)
耐兼ねる: (たえかねる) - to be unable to endure; to be unable to stand (something); to lose patience
耐圧力: (たいあつりょく) - capacity to resist pressure
耐容一日摂取量: (たいよういちにちせっしゅりょう) - tolerable daily intake; TDI
耐容線量: (たいようせんりょう) - tolerance dose
耐容１日摂取量: (たいよういちにちせっしゅりょう) - tolerable daily intake; TDI
耐忍ぶ: (たえしのぶ) - to put up with; to endure; to bear patiently
耐湿性: (たいしつせい) - resistance to damp
耐火物: (たいかぶつ) - refractory; heat resistance material; high temperature resistance material
耐火被覆: (たいかひふく) - fire resistive covering; fireproof coating; fireproof covering
耐火被覆材: (たいかひふくざい) - fire resistive covering material
耐熱ガラス: (たいねつガラス) - heat-resistant glass (e.g. Pyrex); refractory glass
耐熱合金: (たいねつごうきん) - heat-resistant alloys
耐熱材料: (たいねつざいりょう) - heat-resistant material
耐用年数: (たいようねんすう) - (machine's) service life
耐病性: (たいびょうせい) - disease resistance; disease tolerance
耐薬品性: (たいやくひんせい) - chemical resistance; resistant to chemicals; chemical proof
耐震基準: (たいしんきじゅん) - earthquake resistance standards
耐震構造: (たいしんこうぞう) - earthquake-resistant construction
耐風構造: (たいふうこうぞう) - wind-resistant construction
耒偏: (すきへん) - kanji "plow" or "three-branch tree" radical
耕うん機: (こううんき) - cultivator; farm tractor; tiller
耕し得る土地: (たがやしうるとち) - arable land
耕す: (たがやす) - to till; to plow; to plough; to cultivate
耕作放棄: (こうさくほうき) - abandonment of cultivation
耕作放棄地: (こうさくほうきち) - fields and rice paddies that have been abandoned and are no longer cultivated
耕地整理: (こうちせいり) - redeployment of arable land
耕田: (こうでん) - cultivated field (for rice, etc.)
耕耘機: (こううんき) - cultivator; farm tractor; tiller
耕運機: (こううんき) - cultivator; farm tractor; tiller
